command.start:
Hello, I am {botname}.
The language you use can be seen by using /me@{botid}.
If you want to use another language, please use /lang@{botid}.

uptime.message: This bot is currently running for {hour} hour {min} minutes {sec} seconds.

search.error: There was a problem sending your search results! Try {botid} google {keyword}!
search.desc_null: Go to the URL for more information!
search.bot_block: Due to Google's anti-bot policy, it is not searchable. Please try again in a few minutes.

img.error: There was a problem sending the image! Try it with {botid} img {keyword}!

lang.isgroup: You can not change the language in Group Chat. Thank you for your personal chat.
lang.announce: If you would like to change the language to use, please select from the list below.
lang.success: ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ The language to be used in English has changed.
lang.error: Failed to change language. Please try again.

whatanime.name: Japanese name
whatanime.info: Please reply with an animated screenshot and you can search what animations are.
whatanime.isAdult: For adult animation, it does not provide a preview.

welcome.success: The message is set up well.
welcome.help:
How to write an entry message :{roomid} specifies the name of this room, and {userid} is the name of the user. If you turn off, you will not get an entry message.
 Examples :`Welcome to {roomid}, {userid}!`

leave.success: The message is set up well.
leave.help:
How to write an entry message :{roomid} specifies the name of this room, and {userid} is the name of the user. If you turn off, you will not get a message to leave.
 Examples :`{userid} has been removed from {roomid}.`

msginfo.success: It is the information of the desired message.
msginfo.alert: Please reply to the message you want!

weather.apierror: I'm having trouble getting weather information. Please try again in a few minutes.
weather.blank: Please enter the name of the city you wish!
weather.not_found: I did not find the area!

google.info: Please send me a message to translate in reply!

calc.info: Please enter a formula to calculate by reply!
calc.error: An error occurred during the calculation.

command.lowPermission: You lack the right to use this feature.
command.isnotgroup: You can not do this unless you are a group or a super group.

help.content:
What this bot can do is described on the homepage.
The current version of this bot is {version}.

message.except: error. Stickers and images can not be processed.
message.botjoin: Hello, Thank you for allowing me to work in this room. Thank you very much.
message.not_request: You are not the user who requested this feature.
